name: Gallery Of The Grim
description:
You play as the Grim Reaper, but you must collect artworks instead of souls to appease a mysterious entity. 

Game design & original art by Johndavid Haring III (SensPsycho)

Instagram: @johnharingiii.art

This initial version was made in about 10 hours

Controls: 

WASD: move Grim Reaper

Mouse: move soul

Left Click: release soul

Right Click: contain soul

P - pause game (while paused, you can resume game, save highscores, or view the leaderboard)

Esc - exit the game

Move over the scythe & artworks to pick them up

Use your soul to destroy enemies upon collision (it destroys itself automatically if the reaper is off screen)

Click the gallery door to enter / exit the art gallery

Click the entity to view artwork collection progress
